description: [WindTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0466) has used icons mimicking MS Office files to mask payloads.(Citation: objective-see windtail1 dec 2018)

external_references.description: Wardle, Patrick. (2018, December 20). Middle East Cyber-Espionage analyzing WindShift's implant: OSX.WindTail (part 1). Retrieved October 3, 2019.
